name: HomeHealth
0:
”Alexa, open home health”
”Alexa, start home health”
”Alexa, ask home health”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home health
des:
Medocity Smart Home Health Assistant is a companion to the mobile application to allow patients to virtually connect with their care professionals between visits. 

Patient experience is personalized for their specific needs and health condition. Patients can track medication and report vitals.

Once you’ve enabled the skill, say “Alexa ask Home Health…”

To listen your last recorded vital signs , try to say : 
"read my vital signs"
"what are my last recorded vital signs"
...

To report a vital sign :
"report a vital signs"
"update my weight / temperature/activity etc."
"update my blood sugar to 99"
"report my blood pressure as 120 over 130"
...

To listen your upcoming medications :
"tell me my meds"
"upcoming meds"
"what are my medications today"

To report a medication : report a medication as taken or missed!
"report meds"
"I need to report medication"
"what are my medications today"


To create a renew request for a medication : ***Updated*** refill replaced with renew !
"renew my prescription"
"prescription renewal"

To schedule an appointment : ***NEW*** you can now send request to your provider to schedule anappointment !
"i need an appoinment for tomorrow"
"Schedule an appointment"

To get started, sign in with your Medocity username and password (which we keep completely private). 

Disclaimer:

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.


for more information visit : 
www.medocity.com/
